body.name: The Original Office Chair Blanket by SnuggleBack; Cozy Comfy Office Desk Chair Wrap Attaches for Convenient Heat and Hands-Free. Stay Warm In The Winter or Summer. Sherpa Fur Lining

byLineInfo.name: Visit the M PAIN MANAGEMENT TECHNOLOGIES Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 mins
features: PATENT PENDING – One-of-a-kind Chair Blanket that attaches to any Office Chair. Using two sets of elastic straps, the Snuggle Back can attach securely to any office chair, regardless of its shape. The four separate flaps wrap over the limbs of the body to create a cocoon of warmth that is incredibly easy to get in and out of. Simply stand up and the flaps will naturally fall off the body, ready to be quickly wrapped again whenever you return to your chair.

SHERPA CHAIR BLANKET - Be cozy in style and warmth with our super soft plush flannel or luxurious Faux Fur. Experience comfort and warmth without compromising the look of your interior space. The SnuggleBack comes in multiple colors so you can choose the design that fits your personality the best. The inner material is a fluffy sherpa that warms the body to the perfect temperature, turning your bland and basic office chair to a warm and fuzzy bubble you won't want to take off.

ECO-FRIENDLY – Say goodbye to the office thermostat wars. No more debating if the A/C is too high in the summer or the Heat is too low for the winter, the Snuggleback lets you create your own perfect environment at your leisure. Whenever you need to stay warm in the office or at home, the Snuggleback has your back.

NO RISK HEAT – Space heaters and electrical warmers can be dangerous, from short circuits to exposed wires, the risk only increases during long term use of these electric heaters. Our chair blanket uses no electricity and has no wires to expose, so you can feel safe and secure in using your Snuggleback for as you desire. Perfect for long hours at the desk or relaxing at home with some games.

PERFECT SIZE - Our Snuggleback is One Size Fits Most, meaning you can have faith that the Snuggleback should fit your chair and your person. In addition to being one size fits all, our chair blanket is machine washable which makes it very easy to care for. Follow washing instructions to ensure there is no harm caused to the shape or the fabric of the blanket: machine wash cold with like colors and air dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Offices are notoriously cold in the winter and cold in the summer as they blast the AC. Use in your home office or office ofice; The SnuggleBack mounts to any chair back to fix into position and create a ready when you are, swaddle of cozy warmth! Instructions: 1. Attach to chair back by securing the straps in place 2. Drape blanket over armrests. 3. Wrap and unwrap as desired.

PATENT PENDING One-of-a-kind Chair Blanket that attaches to any Office Chair. Wrap the flaps together to create an easy-in and easy-out convenience. SHERPA CHAIR BLANKET Be cozy in style and warmth with our super soft plush flannel or luxurious Faux Fur. The inner material is a fluffy sherpa that heats the body to perfection. So cuddly you won't want to take it off. STAY WARM IN WINTER/SUMMER Say good by to the thermostat wars. Stay warm in the winter, or even in the summer when that office AC is blasting.- Easy to care for: machine wash cold with like colors. NO RISK HEAT A safer way to stay warm at the office; No need to use dangerous space heaters anymore. PERFECT SIZE - One Size Fits ALLMACHINE WASHABLE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and warm
reviews.reviewText: Works well for high back office chair. Easy to install and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for a cold office!
reviews.reviewText: This chair blanket is an absolute game-changer for anyone working in a cold office. It's become a must-have for me, and I can't imagine my workspace without it.The concept of having a blanket attached to my office chair is pure genius. Not only does it save me from the discomfort of shivering through those chilly workdays, but it also keeps me cozy and productive. The convenience factor is off the charts – no more searching for a spare blanket or fumbling with layers of clothing. When the AC is pumping in summer, this is great because I can still wear summer clothes for when I'm outside on my walk breaks, but the office is freezing.What I love most about this is its thoughtful design. The blanket wraps around my shoulders and lap, providing just the right amount of warmth without feeling bulky or restrictive. It's like having a personal, customizable cocoon of comfort.The attachment to the chair is secure and doesn't slip or slide, allowing me to move freely without worrying about it falling off. The fabric is soft and cozy.If you're tired of freezing at your desk, this is a must-have addition to your workspace. I can't recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you warm while you work!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my boss and she loved it! Love how it fits on the chair and wraps around you while you work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easily adjustable to fit
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to put on my office chair in my podcast studio. It sometimes gets chilly in the room during the winter when I’m recording and this is the perfect solution for that. Two pieces drape over the shoulders and two pieces drape across my lap. It keeps my torso and arms warm while recording. It was super easy to install and adjust to fit my particular chair. My only complaint would be the backing is a little flimsy and will sometimes “pop” when I go from leaning forward to sitting back against it again. Overall, a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is so soft!
reviews.reviewText: I love the fabric and the beautiful purple security straps are perfect. Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for colder offices. Easy on and off. Not like a normal blanket. It doesn’t get stuck and fall on the floor. Connects nicely and you can get up easily if needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It came so fast. Very warm and look just like picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super soft but not made correctly on one clasp.
reviews.reviewText: While the item fits my mom's chair great, and it's super soft. However, when we attached it, we couldn't tighten one side due to a mis-sewn clasp (see pictures). If it was sewn correctly and could be tightened down, I would have given 5 stars.

Habe es gekauft, da meine Beine ziemlich schnell kalt im Büro werden und ich nicht direkt mit einer Decke zur Arbeit kommen möchte. Wollte auch nicht das typische "Fahren über die Decke" Problem haben. Da die einzelnen Teile so lang sind, bleiben diese auf dem Boden liegen, wenn man die Decke gerade nicht im Gebrauch hat, was das Problem leider nicht behoben hat. Schnelles Aufstehen ist drin ja, aber beim Hinsetzten muss man sich erstmal die Teile so zurecht nudeln, dass es wieder passt. Zusätzlich hat der Rücken leider nicht gut an meinen Stuhl auf der Arbeit gepasst (zuhause war es passend). Also meiner Meinung nach war es für mich das Geld nicht wert, deshalb habe ich es auch zurück geschickt. Jemand anderem wird es schon eher passen.Und der Karton war zusätzlich gut beschädigt was auch nicht so nice war.
